title: Account
text: Upload photo, manage game settings and create missions.

title: Tanks
text: Offer vehicles for World of Tanks: photos and characteristics.

title: Sessions
text: Make playing sessions in Discord. Share awards while battle and create platoons.

title: Heroes
text: Tell about your tankman-relative: his vehicles, achievements and reply on different questions.

title: Areas
text: Create own game maps with locations and facts; manage size, battle mode and tier border.

title: Profiles
text: Find game-friends, look stats and missions, connect via Telegram.
